questions.question: Which of these lifecycle methodologies is least suitable for use on a safety-critical system?
choices: Incremental development
Spiral model
Waterfall lifecycle
answers: Evolutionary prototyping

questions.question: Which of these lifecycle methodologies is best described as a rigid development methodology with fixed stages that are adressed in a specific order?
choices: Incremental development
Evolutionary prototyping
Spiral model
answers: Waterfall lifecycle

questions.question: Which of the following things is most important if you want to create quality software?
choices: Lots of money
A good requirements specification
The best software tools
answers: Properly trained people

questions.question: What is the optimum number of people on which to evaluate the usability of an interface?
Which of the following is NOT true when building user interface prototypes?
choices: You need to do evaluation on typical users to get sensible results
You can get useful results from a paper-based user interface
Putting realistic data in your prototype screens gives more useful results
answers: You need to make your prototype work for every possible data input

questions.question: Select the most sensible order in which to build a system:
choices: Requirements, design, maintenance, implementation, testing.
Design, requirements, implementation, testing, maintenance.
Requirements, design, implementation, maintenance, testing.
answers: Requirements, design, implementation, testing, maintenance.

questions.question: Which of the following statements is NOT true about Extreme Programming:
choices: It is flexible and responsive to changing user needs.
It is an example of an agile programming methodology.
Unit testing is a key discipline in Extreme Programming.
answers: It includes producing a requirements specification to define what will be produced.

questions.question: Which of the following statements is true?
choices: You can always develop software faster by adding extra programming effort.
A project plan should not be changed once it has been made.
A company should always charge the same amount of money to clients for a day of programmer time.
answers: Time, cost, scope and quality of software are related.

questions.question: Which of the following types of maintenance involves adding extra functionality to your software?
choices: Corrective maintenance.
Adaptive maintenance.
Preventative maintenance.
answers: Perfective maintenance.

questions.question: Which of the following requirements is a functional requirement?
choices: The system should be developed in line with company quality standards.
The system should meet international nuclear power safety standards.
The system should work quickly on Unix computers.
answers: When the user presses the START button, the vehicle should move forward at 2 m/s.

questions.question: Which of the following requirements is an external requirement?
choices: When the user presses the START button, the vehicle should move forward at 2 m/s.
The system should be developed in line with company quality standards.
The system should work quickly on Unix computers.
answers: The system should meet international nuclear power safety standards.

questions.question: Which of the following requirements is not testable?
choices: When the user presses the START button, the vehicle should move forward at 2 m/s.
The system should be developed in line with company quality standards.
The system should meet international nuclear power safety standards.
answers: The system should work quickly on Unix computers.
questions.directions: Lecture 16 slide 18, need a better definition than quickly

questions.question: Which of the following requirements is a process requirement?
choices: When the user presses the START button, the vehicle should move forward at 2 m/s.
The system should meet international nuclear power safety standards.
The system should work quickly on Unix computers.
answers: The system should be developed in line with company quality standards.

questions.question: What is the relationship between ISO 9001 and ISO 9000-3?
choices: ISO 9001 is a more detailed version of ISO 9000-3 specifically for software.
ISO 9001 is a more recent version of ISO 9000-3.
ISO 9000-3 is a more recent version of ISO 9001.
answers: ISO 9000-3 is a more detailed of ISO 9001 specifically for software.

questions.question: Which of the following is not a type of testing?
choices: White box testing
Stress testing
Regression testing
answers: Affective testing

questions.question: Which of the following was not a conclusion of the enquiry into the London Ambulance Service Computer-Aided Despatch Service?
choices: London Ambulance Service needs full-time IT managers.
Around 4 years would be needed to build complete system.
Computer-aided despatch is desirable and should be implemented.
answers: Computer-aided despatch is dangerous and should be avoided.

questions.question: What is the most valuable thing that you can do if your company wants to improve its software processes?
choices: Measure what is done, in order to observe where the problems are.
Improve the way the company system tests its software.
Introduce unit testing to the company.
answers: Put in place a full quality control system to ISO-standards.

questions.question: Which of the following should encourage you to refactor your software?
choices: Complaints from your customers.
An increase in the number of bugs reported.
Bad crashes in your run times.
answers: Bad smells in your code.

questions.question: What does a sequence diagram show about the way your program works?
choices: The methods that one class calls in another class
The structure of a class
How the hard parts of your code can be written
answers: How a main operation of the program works by calling different classes/methods

questions.question: In the Software Engineering Institute's Capability Maturity Model, which level describes an organization that is constantly attempting to improve its performance?
choices: Level 1
Level 3
Level 7
answers: Level 5

questions.question: Which of the following is best as a definition of software engineering
choices: Software engineering is about making bug-free software
Software engineering is about always making the best software we can
Software engineering is about carrying out lots of quality procedures to make your customers happy
answers: Software engineering is about consistently making software of a level of quality appropriate to its use

questions.question: Why are documented procedures and management necessary in order to produce quality software?
choices: Because software developers need to be kept in line or they do the wrong thing
Because it makes management happy that they are in charge
Because the ISO standard says so
answers: Because software development is complex and there are many things that need to be remembered

questions.question: Which of the following is not a good reason for holding a code review in your development team?
choices: In order to share good programming practice among the team
In order to identify potential problems in code before it is deployed
In order to give the team a better understanding of the coding standards used
answers: In order to identify the best and worst programmers in your team

questions.question: Which kind of testing is done by the customer of the software rather than the developer?
choices: Integration testing
Unit testing
System testing
answers: Acceptance testing

questions.question: Which of the following statements is not true?
choices: UML stands for Unified Modelling Language.
Component Diagrams are part of UML.
Sequence Diagrams are part of UML.
answers: UML is a process for modelling systems.

questions.question: On a project which has been running for two years and is behind schedule for delivery in six months time, which of the following strategies is most likely to make things worse?
choices: Adding extra staff to the project to increase the effort available
Reducing the functionality that will be delivered at the due date
Identifying outside expertise that can help with specific problems
answers: Revise the plan to give a later delivery date
